boat.full_description: In the year 2000, Liam and Nigel recovered from a mud bank the remains of an 1893 Heir Island lobster boat, the "Honora". From "Honora's" authentic and unique lines three new boats have been built, and a fourth is under construction at Hegarty's yard. Nigel Towse is lovingly and accurately restoring the "Honora" at his premises on Sherkin Island. The history of these boats is documented by maritime historian Cormac Levis in "Towelsail Yawls: the Lobsterboats of Heir Island and Roaringwater Bay" (Galley Head Press, 2002).
boat.name: Saoirse Muireann
